      • testCredentials

        public java.lang.String testCredentials(java.lang.String password)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the passed password string corresponds to the account's password, and returns the account's cookie during login. If the password is invalid, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
